name: keycloak
tagline: An open source identity and access management solution
description: Keycloak is an open source identity and access management solution. It provides SSO, OAuth2 and OpenID Connect, user federation and fine grained authorization policies, and can be self hosted or used as part of managed offerings.

features.title: User Federation
features.description: Connect to existing user databases and LDAP directories. Leverage existing identity stores

features.title: Social Login
features.description: Enable login with social providers like Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn. Simplify user onboarding

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Role-based access control with custom policies and permissions. Control resource access precisely

features.title: User Account Management
features.description: Self-service account management with password reset and profile updates. Empower users to manage accounts
